item.title: 三得利首席执行官称特朗普关税扼杀投资热情
item.description: 日本最大的饮料制造商之一的负责人表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税可能会导致经济衰退，从而使企业不愿在这个世界最大的经济体投资。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs could drive a recession that will make companies reluctant to invest in the world’s largest economy, according to the head of one of Japan’s biggest beverage makers.】

item.title: 减少移民能否解决澳大利亚的住房危机？
item.description:
在本周的澳大利亚播客中：Rebecca Jones 与移民专家 Abul Rizvi 谈论大选前各主要政党的政策

。【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Rebecca Jones talks to immigration expert Abul Rizvi about the major parties’ policies ahead of the election

】

item.title: 美元疲软提振金属，铜价创两周新高
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所自周四以来首次恢复交易后，铜价上涨了 1%以上，因为基本金属受益于近期美元的下跌。【原文：Copper gained more than 1% after trading on the London Metal Exchange resumed for the first time since Thursday, as base metals benefited from the recent dollar rout.】

item.title: 泰国称与美国就特朗普关税计划的谈判被推迟
item.description: 泰国正寻求从特朗普政府对其商品征收 36% 关税的计划中获得缓和，该国表示，原定于本周举行的部长级会谈已被推迟。【原文：Thailand, which is seeking a reprieve from Trump administration’s plan to levy a 36% tariff on its goods, said ministerial level talks previously scheduled for this week have been delayed.】

item.title: 调查显示特朗普关税已对部分日本企业造成冲击
item.description: 据一项调查显示，唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动的影响已经渗透到日本公司，约有 10%的公司表示关税措施已经影响了他们的业务，更多的公司对未来的冲击表示担忧。【原文：The impact of Donald Trump’s tariff campaign has already filtered through to Japanese companies, with about 10% saying the measures have affected their businesses and more voicing concern on the future jolt, according to a survey.】

item.title: 住友商事和 SBI 控股将参股越南 FPT 人工智能部门
item.description: 住友商事株式会社（Sumitomo Corp.）和 SBI 控股株式会社（SBI Holdings Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Corp. and SBI Holdings Inc. will each acquire a 20% stake in a unit of Vietnam’s software and telecommunications conglomerate FPT Corp. to foster AI adoption in Japan, according to a statement.】

item.title: 印度莫迪将会见沙特王储，推动建立更密切的关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦达-莫迪（Narenda Modi）将于周二开启为期两天的沙特阿拉伯之行，在全球贸易不确定性日益加剧之际，他将寻求加深与这个主要石油出口国和欧佩克+领导人的关系。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narenda Modi is set to kick off a two-day trip to Saudi Arabia on Tuesday as he seeks to deepen ties with the major oil exporter and OPEC+ leader at a time of mounting global trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 随着货币交易激增，花旗支持的平台 Spark 将招聘 13 名员工
item.description: 随着交易量和市场波动的增加，Spark Systems Pte.【原文：Spark Systems Pte. is looking to boost its foreign-exchange sales and developer ranks with up to 13 hires as trading volumes ramp up alongside market volatility.】

item.title: 印度央行增加现金比降息更有助于降低借贷成本
item.description: 印度央行史无前例地注入流动性，使关键隔夜利率大幅低于基准利率，预示着货币宽松政策将进一步深化。【原文：The Indian central bank’s unprecedented liquidity injections have pushed a key overnight rate significantly below the benchmark, signaling deeper monetary easing.】

item.title: 日本加藤希望本周与贝森特进一步开展外汇对话
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）表示，他的目标是本周在华盛顿与美国财务大臣斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）会面时，继续密切讨论货币问题。【原文：Japan’s Minister of Finance Katsunobu Kato said he aims to build on close discussions pertaining to currencies when he meets his US counterpart Scott Bessent in Washington this week.】

item.title: 收购公司 Thoma Bravo 接近达成收购波音公司杰普逊部门的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Thoma Bravo 公司正在就收购波音公司的杰普逊导航部门进行深入谈判。【原文：Thoma Bravo is in advanced talks to buy Boeing Co.’s Jeppesen navigation unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金属亿万富翁阿加瓦尔在债务重组和沙特推动下寻求重启矿业
item.description: 印度亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）正逐步接近完成其金属能源企业集团韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）计划已久的分拆，此举旨在削减该集团 110 亿美元的债务，并将更多精力放在不同的业务上。【原文：Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal is inching closer to finishing a long-planned breakup of his metals-to-energy conglomerate Vedanta Ltd., a move aimed at trimming the group’s $11 billion debt pile and giving greater attention to different businesses.】

item.title: 特朗普加强对美联储鲍威尔的威胁，黄金飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统可能解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的担忧引发美股、债券和美元出逃之后，黄金升至历史新高。【原文：Gold rose to an all-time-high, after concern that President Donald Trump could fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell triggered a flight from US stocks, bonds and the dollar.】

item.title: 中国氧化铝出口飙升至七年新高，盈余扩大
item.description: 中国氧化铝供应日益过剩，推动 3 月份出口量达到历史第二高水平，预计在未来几个月内出口量仍将保持高位。【原文：China’s growing glut of alumina pushed exports to their second-highest level ever in March, with shipments expected to remain elevated for several more months.】

item.title: 日本顶级基金因估值低廉增持三菱不动产股票
item.description: 过去几个月里，一家业绩最好的日本股票基金买入了三菱不动产公司的股票，原因是该基金认为，由于国内房地产行业仍然具有吸引力，通胀将提高收入。【原文：A top-performing Japanese stock fund bought shares of Mitsubishi Estate Co. over the past months on the view that inflation will lift revenue as the domestic real estate sector remains attractive.】

item.title: 市场追随风险厌恶情绪和贸易战担忧，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普批评美联储之后，全球市场重拾风险厌恶基调，同时对中美贸易战的担忧持续存在，石油价格在周一下滑之后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after slumping on Monday as a risk-off tone returned to global markets following President Donald Trump’s criticism of the Federal Reserve, while concerns over a US-China trade war persist.】

item.title: CFTC 就全天候衍生品交易和永续期货征求意见
item.description: 商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）周一发表声明称，正在就允许衍生品市场全天候交易征求公众意见。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is asking for public comment on allowing round-the-clock trading in derivatives markets, according to a statement Monday.】

item.title: 华尔街暴跌后亚洲股市面临压力：市场综述
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统加大了对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的批评力度，美国股市、债券和美元遭到抛售，周二亚洲市场可能将承压。【原文：Asian markets will likely come under pressure Tuesday after US stocks, bonds and the dollar were sold off as President Donald Trump ramped up criticism of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 谷歌向三星支付巨额 "双子座 "人工智能应用安装费
item.description: 根据法庭证词，Alphabet 公司每月向三星电子公司支付 "巨额资金"，以便在其手机和设备上预装谷歌生成式人工智能应用程序 "双子座"（Gemini），尽管该公司付费安装的做法已两次被认定违法。【原文：Alphabet Inc. pays Samsung Electronics Co. an “enormous sum of money” every month to preinstall Google generative AI app, Gemini, on its phones and devices, according to court testimony, even though the company’s practice of paying for installations has twice been found to violate the law.】

item.title: 麦格理将向野村出售美国和欧洲公共资产部门
item.description: 麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）同意以 28 亿澳元（18 亿美元）的价格将其北美和欧洲公共投资业务出售给野村公司（Nomura Inc.【原文：Macquarie Asset Management agreed to sell its North American and European public investments business to Nomura Inc. for A$2.8 billion ($1.8 billion) as part of its increased focus on private markets.】

item.title: 美国对从东南亚进口的太阳能产品征收新关税
item.description: 美国对从四个东南亚国家进口的太阳能产品征收新的关税，这四个国家为美国提供了大部分太阳能电池板。【原文：The US set new duties on solar imports from four Southeast Asian nations that together provide the country with the bulk of its panels.】

item.title: 交易员在 "最平静 "的市场大跌中毫不动摇，大宗交易日堆积如山
item.description: 随着 S&P 500 指数再次暴跌、美元暴跌和黄金飙升至新纪录，华尔街似乎被一种 "不景气 "的情绪所淹没。【原文：As the S&P 500 plunged again, the dollar tumbled and gold surged to a new record, Wall Street seemed overwhelmed by a sense of ho-hum.】

item.title: 能源与环境部要求证交会员工提供提高效率的建议，并承诺匿名
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率小组进驻美国证券交易委员会后，该委员会要求员工提出意见，以帮助精简机构运作。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission asked staff to send along ideas to help streamline agency operations following the arrival of Elon Musk’s government efficiency group at the regulator.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行和花旗集团为 KKR 收购 OSTTRA 提供 17 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）、花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Barclays Plc, Citigroup Inc. and KKR Capital Markets are underwriting approximately $1.7 billion in debt to support KKR’s $3.1 billion buyout of post-trade services company OSTTRA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼银行应对波动，印尼盾将扩大跌幅
item.description: 据分析师称，由于投资者信心脆弱，印尼盾将延续今年 4% 的跌幅，这将促使中央银行进一步干预，以遏制波动。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah will extend this year’s 4% decline due to fragile investor confidence, spurring further intervention by the central bank to stem volatility, according to analysts.】

item.title: 多米尼加共和国派领导人赴华盛顿参加关税谈判
item.description: 多米尼加共和国本周将派代表团前往华盛顿，就唐纳德-特朗普政府不顾多米尼加对美国的贸易逆差而对该国征收 10%关税一事展开谈判。【原文：The Dominican Republic is sending a delegation to Washington this week to begin negotiations over the 10% tariffs that the Donald Trump administration slapped on the country despite its trade deficit with the US.】

item.title: 前 LTCM 合伙人哈加尼警告：美国债券并非 "无风险 "资产
item.description: 长期资本管理公司（Long-Term Capital Management）创始合伙人维克多-哈加尼（Victor Haghani）也加入了这一行列，他警告说，美国债券市场不可能为关税引发的波动提供无风险的庇护。【原文：Long-Term Capital Management founding partner Victor Haghani has joined the chorus warning that US bond markets are unlikely to offer a risk-free shelter from tariff-induced volatility.】

item.title: 美联储预估显示联邦劳动力可能缩减 120 万人
item.description: 根据亚特兰大联邦储备银行的分析，美国联邦政府的员工总数可能会缩减 100 多万人，这主要反映了政府通过合同和拨款间接雇用的人员估计会减少。【原文：The broader US federal workforce could shrink by more than 1 million, according to an analysis from the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta, largely reflecting an estimated reduction in those indirectly employed by the government through contracts and grants.】

item.title: 中国茶叶连锁店赴美上市为众多上市候选者带来希望
item.description: 中国茶叶连锁企业茶叶控股有限公司（Chagee Holdings Ltd. ）在 2025 年 4 月完成了一项看似不可能完成的壮举：不仅在关税大战中成功在美国上市，而且股价还高于发行价。它的成功经验为考虑进行交易的公司带来了一线希望。【原文：Chinese tea chain Chagee Holdings Ltd. managed what in April 2025 seems like an impossible feat: not only did it pull off a successful US IPO in the middle of a tariff war, its shares are trading above its offering price. Its playbook offers a few rays of hope for firms considering going ahead with deals.】

item.title: Roblox 用户组再现现实生活中的大规模枪击事件
item.description: 一群 Roblox 用户正在这个深受孩子们喜爱的游戏平台上重现现实生活中的校园枪击事件，包括柯伦拜高中和得克萨斯州乌瓦尔德市罗布小学的袭击事件。【原文：A group of Roblox users is re-creating real life school shooting incidents on the gaming platform that’s popular with kids, including attacks at Columbine High School and the Robb Elementary School in Uvalde, Texas.】
